sections.paragraph: முன்பு, எதிரே, அண்மையில், சமீபத்தில், தூரத்தில், முகத்துக்கு - எச்சம்
what is conspicuous, what is in front of, in front of, straight forward, before, in sight of

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From H5046; a front, that is, part opposite; specifically a counterpart, or mate; usually (adverbially, especially with preposition) over against or before: - about, (over) against, X aloof, X far (off), X from, over, presence, X other side, sight, X to view.
Cognate: H5046, H5048, H5057
